content.detailedDescription: At 5 min. after midnight 3/25/15 i observed in the east sky while star gazing a set of four white lights parallel to each other with one white light below, centered, and blinking.  the event lasted about 30 sec. and in that time i was able to view lights via my 10x50 binoculars. this did not reveal any structural basis to the lights, just lights.  then, suddenly, the lights disappeared.  in the brief time it took for me to place my binoculars down and turn back to look,  gone without a trace. no decent, no directional change, i got nothing.  this is the primary reason for my report. also, and important, there was no contrail present or related to this sighting.  i do plenty of late night star gazing and know the difference between various space and air craft.  they just don't vanish in a second. and last night it was easy to see aircraft leaving contrails in the wake.
content.summary: Observed 4 white ligths parallel w/ one centered below blinking.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work as usual, ear buds in, just glad the day was done. i followed the hwy that has allot of curves and dips. looking up to the left i noticed 2 huge perfect circle lights that seemed aimed straight in my direction....The sky was heavily clouded with rain clouds and the lights appeared to be just skimming the bottom, yet not moving. i slowed way down ( much the annoyance of the car behind me for a better look) it seemed the the craft rotated as i passed it keeping its lights focused toward me and as i came even to it i saw the the clouds were reflected on the surface that seemed rounded. finally as i continued it rotated forward away from me.And slowly melted into the clouds....I searched for any signs of anything else flying but found nothing.....There was no beam of light nor a stream of light you'd expect from a beam that bright through rain clouds.....
content.summary: 2 massive white headlight  like lights were stationary just  below the rain clouds. the beams were aimed  directly at  me..

content.detailedDescription: In las vegas nevada, on top of the worlds largest ferris wheel called the high roller, at the top my father took pictures all around him of the land and sky in broad daylight, did not see anything with naked eye in the sky, but later looked at pictures and saw 8 bright lights in a pattern to the left of picture, to the right is a single object that looks like it is sucking up another object. i immidiately thought ufo being a worldly person as the thought gave cold chills to my spine, the objects seem to be able to hide in daylight but my dad was very lucky enough to catch them in a picture, about an hour or more before the picture was took the janet jets were seen flying to area 51.
content.summary: Took a picture in broad daylight, saw objects unable to see with naked eye

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en cerro bastante alto cuando miro al horizonte me doy cuenta que habia un objeto estatico y estuvo hay por mas de 17 minutos llame a tres amigos y los dirijia para que miraran si desde su ubicacion logravan ver algo y lo lograron ver pero no fotografiarlo
content.summary: Es mantenia estacionario encima de un walmart

content.detailedDescription: a light type orb, traveling west, caught my eyes, i stepped outside and i was able to see light orb traveling west, 3 times over and my husband saw this as well. i was washing dishes and looked out my window and this light caught my eye and it was traveling pretty fast and would get brighter..I then yelled for my husband to come out and i pointed him in direction of the light and he was able to get a good sighting as well. it then disappeared and he went back in and i felt this wasn't over, so i waited and watched, and within 8 minutes or so, there it is again and it was in very same place we saw the first one, still traveling, no blinking, there was a plane out right before i saw the first one and you could see that it was a plane !! when my husband came out the second time...Again...He saw it too!!! it took about 20 to 30 seconds for it to disappear!! again, it would brighten, and dim, but traveling fast in a straight line! i grabbed my chair and stayed out at this point and within 5 minutes.., again!!! same light moving across the sky and brightened and was also in very same location !!! my husband witnessed this happening with me and i am not sure what these lights were but very interested in what these lights were. the glow was light, almost star like. not pulsating, just brightened and dimmed and then would disappear!! all 3 exactly alike!!! even the birds in my backyard were behaving strangely and 1 flew up to my face and"screeched" at me, during the sightings...Kind of scared me!!! lol'
content.summary: 3 separate light orbs traveling west of my home. i saw the 1st one, while washing dishes, then discontinued dishes to get outside

content.detailedDescription: Monday evening i rode with my fiancé to deposit money in our atm. as i was sitting in the passenger seat i thought the sky was looking really pretty, and i wanted to take a picture. when we pulled away from the atm and got to the stop sign i pulled my phone out and snapped two back to back pics. as soon as i took the pics my fiancé said what was that bright flash of light? i saw a bright flash too but honestly i didn't think much of it until i looked back at my pictures. the second picture i took looked normal but the first one i took had a strange looking saucer object in the sky.  it was a warm clear night. if this is a ufo it went by so fast that no one would actually be able to see it.  i've shown friends the pics and some think its a car light but i don't believe that because there is nothing in the second pic and i literally took it a second after the first and we both saw a bright flash of light go by.
content.summary: Took 2 pics of the sky and saw a ufo n one pic

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful clear day and i thouht i would take some pictures of the sky from my front porch screen door,and a video. i aimed the digital camera out the door and i continually snapped pictures and took a video.After i downloaded them a few days later i was in shock and awe and could not believe what i was seeing.It looked like a ufo large flying in over the apt complex right up to my apt and flying up to me at my porch over my apt.Then put a beam on,shot back behind the eave of my roof and came back out hovered doing this twice,shot out in front of me ,hovered and put a beam on.Then shot over to other side and hovered where the trees were,then shot straight up angle wise.It all happened so quickly. i lost the video from an error and im sick about it.But at least i have pix from frames of video. i blew up the picture of the craft and it loooks metallic in nature. i also took them to six retired air force kernals and they said i had some interesting pictures and believed it was a ufo and that i should take it to the news. i never did,for i was scared people would think im crazy. in fear also because since this happened among other experiences, and many in my life and pictures too,even of aliens as a teleportee,i have had one encounter with the men in black,and one visitation to my apt from them. here are my pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While i was taking pictures out my front porch screen door i captured a ufo flying up to my apt and put a beam on at me

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small condo complex with 24 units.  on the east side of the buildings is a sprawling canyon area with a few homes on the further hilltop. it is a rural area and the hillsides are covered with oak and scrub oak and the like.
there is a row of power line towers that cross the canyon and make their way up the hillside on the other side.  i woke up randomly near 5 am.  i went out on my patio for some reason, and i saw a strange brilliant blue light across the canyon area.  i went outside and over to the fence to get a better look.  i saw a light sphere or orb that was bright blue and from it it was emitting what looked like a laser or plasma dome over itself.  i say lasers because it looked like lasers shooting out from the center sphere with the effect being the look of a half circle with the flat part on the underneath near the ground.  the blue lights would fade to almost undetectable to bright blue and pulsating.  it at one point dropped a white orb or sphere.  this light would travel eastward from the blue light.  it traveled slowly and sort of milled around different areas before returning to the blue orb.  while the white orb was away from the blue one, the blue one would fade out almost entirely.  upon the return of the white one, the blue one became exceptionally bright.  the blue one was also not stationary.  it would follow the ground and raise up off the ground as well.  even though it was a dark evening, it wasn't so dark that i couldn't make out the tree line or the power line towers.  the blue one remained in the area of a tower that is different than the others.  it is more rectangular and different in purpose perhaps.  i will hike over and see what there is to see.  the blue orb would move a little back and forth east and south/west as well as up and down the hillside.  it would not venture out like the white one.  the white one would go out mill around and return.  it did this numerous times.  each time it met up again with the blue one, the blue one would get very bright.  i watched them for approx 25 minutes until the white one returned to the blue one and seemed like it went inside the blue one which then faded out and was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I witnessed two light spheres/orbs across the canyon area behind my house and watched for 25 minutes.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Posted on friday, september 18, 2009 - 09:57 pm:   	
flying wing mirage... or yb-49 in 'silent' flight over?

i first though i saw the faint silhouette of a large night owl seen through the branches of a tree, but when i followed it in the dark as it cleared the tree, i thought i was seeing a mirage of a large flying wing silently gliding through the night sky. it traveled northwest to southeast over what from its point of reference would have been over the coast of orange county in southern california. but i couldn't be sure, because it had no engine noise, no flashing lights, no lights at all except for the eerie glow from beneath, more like a reflection of city lights, as it quickly disappeared into the night sky. it did seem to glow of its own light, very faint, like a low amber light with no running lights at all, and no sound. it was fast too. 

i immediately dismissed it, thinking i was seeing things, or some sort of ufo, when over these past days a strange idea kept insinuating itself to me. the image of a flying wing in the night sky was not a ufo but a test plane reincarnated from the old yb-49 era, with a new engine aboard, one silent that gives off a faint glow. it moved quickly enough to make me think it was a jet, but no sound at all. what was it, this flying wing 'mirage', my mind kept asking subconsciously? 

however, as this flying wing concept was inherently unstable, why would anyone be bringing it back now, except on an experimental basis? and that's what my mind read, that this above silent, lightless plane was an experimental run of a new kind of engine based on a whole new kind of physics. i imagined, more like a mirage, that aboard was a spherical vacuum container within which was high spinning hot gas plasma, so its self gravitating spin was generating a radiating axial light energy, which covered the whole plane with a faint eery light. but more importantly, it boosted the vessel's lift by lowering its 'inertial mass' (lower g aboard), so it took very little to maneuver the craft with silent engines and great stability. the axial jets of energy were covering the whole body of the craft, which is what gave its eerie light. this would be new physics, and it would be revolutionary to say the least. but i am only reading my imagination and have no way to confirm any of this, except as an apparition or mirage of what i saw. it definitely was not a b-2, which i had seen in night flight over oklahoma. so what was it? 

could our air force be testing an experimental plane over the southern california coast, flying it from edwards base? the base was named after a pilot who died in the second test of yb-49, so why not? but it must be 'above top secret' if so, and we may never know until a fleet is produced in some future. for now, i will treat it as another ufo. if its our own, we will learn it by and by. but why test it here, with no running lights? unless... it was to give the city lights a show?
content.summary: Looking up at night sky, south, about 9:30 pm, saw what looked like a glowing flying wing boomerang glowing pale yellow. it silently flew west to east with no lights.

content.detailedDescription: When i was in the 3rd or 4th grade my mother and myself witnessed 2 ufos, my mother would take us out every time she got paid, so although im not sure of the particular date or year, i can narrow it down to a friday, and most likely between 2001/02/03, which really isn't bad because the scene was something im sure someone else witnessed. so this day, after 3:30pm school was let out, my mother already cashed her check, and my 2 brothers, mother and myself were en route to go out to eat. while we were driving by one of the airports, i was in the backseat, behind my older brother when maybe 40 miles to my right, high in the sky, were 2 stationary grey spheres. not exactly sure what they were i asked everyone "what are those", when suddenly both objects started to zigzag in the sky, going miles apart then stopping suddenly, returning, literally going all over the sky, then stopping, no particular flight pattern just random crazy zig zags, then sudden stops. we kept driving, and i eventually lost sight of them. my mother witnessed them also but my 2 brothers couldn't see them although they were trying to, that's literally how fast they were traveling, then making sudden stops. when i ask my mother does she remember she plays it weak and says "yeah we saw something" which is kind of annoying because i know for a fact that she remembers more, she lives in "reality". i was horrified of the dark as a child, and i do remember(imagined) a couple nights being extremely scared that i would have an circular vehicle with about 20 small led that shined bright like headlights and were in a circular formation on the front of the craft outlining a window would use powers to abduct me through the window(lol) and i slept in my parents room for a bit, although i will admit im not sure if that was directly connected to that particular sighting or not. we lived in a lower income neighborhood, so witnessing ufos at that time when you're hearing gunshots nightly probably wasn't seen as a priority also is why im not exactly sure of the date this occurred, nor why none of us thought to document it, we had different issues daily. i recently found myself and grew back fascinated with the universe, so that's why im now documenting this. ive realized how important that sighting was and the magnitude of what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2sphere ufos in columbusarea 2001or02

content.detailedDescription:
I was 17 years old and we were at an illegal dance party in a field near nottingham i had been taking lsd so perhaps this sighting could have been attributed to the drugs however it did seem very real to me at the time and i wasn't the only witness...  i saw a very slow moving fighter jet like object it had wings but they wouldn't be very aero dynamic as the craft was like a cross shape and the wings had a downward portion on their tip the craft was definately a one or two seater aircraft and it moved so slow and made not even a modicum of noise.. it had lights on the leading edge of the wings that flashed out a beam of white light... this was my first ufo experience and happened well before i was visited by the gray aliens.. there isn't much more i can say about the sighting really so i will leave it at that

thanks martin
content.summary: A very slow moving noiseless airplane like fighter slowly flew over a rave.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hearing voices in my head and they said that if i went for a walk i would see a ufo... this has happened before when i saw a shooting star that perhaps the aliens were tracking so i decided to give it a shot... what had i to lose so i put on my coat and walked out the door... a friend of mine had started a fire in a field once and it made a circle in the ground so we called this field the ufo field and i walked towards there however before i reached the 'ufo' field i stood in the car park where the guys play cricket next to the pavilion and i saw a ball of lights in the sky...  the lights on this ball were an orangy red in colour and there seemed to be two configurations in the pattern of lights on the ball and they flashed in sequence about 10 lights flashed on and then another 10 flashed on.  i watched in amazement for a good few minutes and then something fantastic happened that is kind of unbelievable a beam of blue light came out of the craft at about a thirty degree angle downwards and the beam stopped and the end of the beam opened out into kind of an oblique square almost as if it was projected onto a cloud but it wasn't... i didn't feel scared because i have been visited by gray aliens for a number of years however i was totally blown away how the beam of light seemed to stop almost like it was made of some hard substance... i have seen four or five ufos in all my years and this is one of my stranger experiences.. 

thanks... martin
content.summary: A ball with lights on it that flashed and it emitted a beam that turned into an oblique square.

content.detailedDescription:
Amateur radio operators are well aware of recent sun spot activity as it affects short wave communications.
"on tuesday, march 17 a cme struck earth producing the largest geomagnetic storm of the current solar cycle. aurora was visible all the way down to the central united states. the planetary a index for the day was 117, an incredibly high number." 
-- http://www.Arrl.Org/news/the-k7ra-solar-update-366

a ham operator decided to have a look at the "northern lights". weko beach, bridgman, michigan, offered an excellent view of the northern sky. an excellent photographer, this person took a series of relatively high resolution photos of the aurora with his nikon d7000.

rough coordinates for the weko beach (public) are: 41° 57' n; 86° 45' w.  if you like i can get the exact coordinates from a signpost on the beach.

as the ham club newsletter editor and friend, the photographer sent me two of several photos taken. they are:
dsc_7510.Jpg; 8.6mb; 17mar15, 22:20 local time (edt). zoomed in
dsc_7525.Jpg; 9.1mb; 17mar15, 22:32 local time (edt).

as a ufo buff, i saw an unidentified string of lights in dsc_7510. reminded me of the phoenix lights from a distance. looking at dsc_7525 i believe there's a barely visible thin black line in the aurora that i can't explain. the very bright lights at the extreme right in each photo are flood lights at the dc cook nuclear plant.

btw, the orange in the foreground seems to be light (perhaps moonlight) as it reflected off of the sand covered ice mounds at the weko beach shoreline.
content.summary: Hi rez photo showed an unexplained string of while lights over lake michigan off of the dc cook nuclear plant.

content.detailedDescription:
I stood in my front door and witnessed a craft hovering over the house across the street it was probably 100 feet away.  i heard no sound and thought at first it was a satalite or just a star.  i was talking to the object and as i watched someone walked down the street on my side of the road.  the object descended below the house until the person had passed by and then returned to its original position about a metre above the house and behind it.  i immediately ran upstairs and returned with a large knife and i held the knife in my hands with my hands outstretched in front of me. i layed the knife on the ground in a gesture of peace as if i was laying down arms.  i have been visited by gray aliens for much of my life and it is always a thrill to see a ufo in the flesh.  i have seen about four ufo's and also voices in my head once told me to go outside if i wanted to see something and i walked up the street and saw a shooting star that they had probably been tracking.  anyway back to the story... i stood outside my house for about five minutes more and the ufo finally rose up into the sky and disappeared... i really think these type of aliens are here to help us on earth... i think they despise the use of nuclear bombs and they cannot stay on the surface of this planet long because of fungi and bacteria... they are making some of their children into humanoids very much like us however they want their children to lay eggs... i once had an experience of how male grays look after their eggs the female has a vagina where our belly button is and the males suck the eggs out of this hole and clean them in their mouths before returning them to the vagina i am unsure if the eggs are fertilised in this way or if they are merely maintaining the health of the infant grays...  once i was taken to a base where i met some of their human like females and was encouraged to have sex with them.. i had three girls sit on me and they expect you to come immediately so i was unable to come with the first two girls and cried for the third girl to stay on me longer they were really stunning girls in their looks and they had strange vaginas in that they were bigger in girth than our women and the inside of their holes were covered in spikey protuberances as if to give the man grip when he enters them... i was just able to come inside the third girl but i did notice that the girls seemed to lack self esteem despite being absolutely amazing to look at... i felt they thought they were not good enough when i didn't come immediately... i think their vaginas were this size so they can push out eggs with babys inside...I guess you would know their babys because they would not have belly buttons when they break from the eggshell... i have also noticed that they don't like how we eat eggs perhaps because they are scared that they may be used like chickens..  i know this would not happen and i hope you agree with me...
thank-you for listening... martin
content.summary: I saw a light that responded to my actions as if the occupants knew me.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my third unexplained sighting since sept' 2010, the last two were in the last two evenings, march 23-24th/ 2015. 

this is directly from my notes i made immediately after my sighting.
i typed these into my phones note app, emailed it to myself, and copied them directly here.
________________________________________________________________

v shaped ufo sighted. approx 9:15pm, on tuesday, march 24th.
perfectly clear evening
come out for smoke. always look up, 

caught the dimmed v shaped object. 
as it flew over head at approx 3000ft give or take a thousand. (not great at distances) 

i could see the distinct outline of a v shape with approx 7-9 round yellow lights that were not bright at all, as if the craft was encased in a dark mesh like cloak. 

lights appeared to be like 10-15% brightness. i say it was moving at a clip of 200kms to 300kms. hard to tell, but like a little faster than an aircraft on a approach to land on a runway. zero blinking lights. never heard engine noise. yes this is toronto but it was low enough i should have heard something at this altitude. i do for other planes that are always over toronto skies late at night. 

this craft was not in my opinion any known civilian craft i have ever seen in person. 

address of sighting.
242 rosemount ave.

anyway... this is my 3rd sighting since sept 10 2010.  and the 2nd in the last 2 nights. last night was a bright star sized object that was under intelligent control before going dim, or out of range. (ice blue in color)
i saw it from the same vantage point i did during the v shaped sighting the night after.  this thing i thought was a high altitude plane at first, but when it slowed to a stop, i knew it was wasnt a plane, then it made a curved trajectory out of sight in approx 5 seconds. no blinking lights at all.  about the size of a large star in the night sky.   

back to my sighting this eve, it was heading directly south, along dufferin road. it truly was not, i repeat, not a civilian aircraft at all. at all. no wing light were blinking. this was extremely real, v shaped , 7-9 lights underneath. flew out of sight. sighting lasted 45-1min seconds before craft faded out of view heading due south from the north

this was real!
content.summary: Went outside for smoke, looked up, saw object emerge from tree branches overhead, fly low from north to south over toronto towards lake ontario.

content.detailedDescription: I wish to state this is my 600th observation of strange phenomena.  my mother sighted a saucer like aerial in edmonton in 1963 while tending to hang clothes outside her home.  she is stout and sober; as am i who is versed with not believing in the myth of old legend.
content.summary: As stated; two weird glowing objects were tracing an arch.  while i was walking by boonie doon here in edmonton.  the discs were blue like and emitting a glow of white and yellow; and noted a distinct aura of gray.

content.summary: Ive been seeing these sphere ufos daily & thought i was losing it i really know in my gut this is real i noticed chemtrails where the sunrises that go straight up n then fly no sound silverdisk i see about 10 or more a day since march 20th where my

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were coming home from our business.  i had what looked like a very odd ball of fire catch my eye in the sky.  it looked like a ball that was flat on one side.  it looked like it was shooting fire off the sides.  it would get bigger than smaller.  it disappeared for about two minutes.  then it came back.  my sister even took a video of it with her cell phone.  that video does not catch even what we saw with our eyes.
content.summary: Strange object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was working at my desk in my home office and at aproximately 3:15, i glanced out my window and saw several orbs pulsating up in the sky. at least over 10. at first, i though it was debris in the air but after studying it for a few minutes, i realized they weren't decending. my window faces north and they were moving north east. i took a video. weather balloons are much larger to my knowledge and i just can't account for their flashing. they were reflective. i studied them for 15mins altogether before they went out of my view.
content.summary: Mutiple orbs, flashing, looking metallic and reflective..Never seen anything like them.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a professional photographer and amatuer astronomer that works at the new jersey astronomical association observatory in voohees new jersey.

i was taking pictures of my son and because i am a drone flyer i saw an object in the sky moving rather quickly across airport grounds.  because i thought that this object was a security drone i snapped the picture and didnt really look at it for weeks.

after finally looking at it to compare to my drone i noticed that it was not a drone at all.  it had 4 dome like structures and a central structure holding it together. there is no obvious flight surface to provide lift so one would assume a balloon. unfortunately i had never seen a balloon move this fast and with such purpose...In a straight line and at a level height.

could it be a drone? possible....But given the distance and using some simple geometry (and some assumptions) i estimated the craft to be roughly 20-25 feet across.

this is my 3rd strange sighting i have had in my life. and the only one made during the day over a very active airport.

in addition i have the raw.  i took this with a 70-200mm f2.8 canon lens...So not cheap glass.....And the detail on the raw can be zoomed way in with little loss of resolution. i will try to attach.
content.summary: Taking pics of my son while waiting for flight

content.detailedDescription:
Approx. 8:45 pm central time, tuesday, march 24, 2015. elkhorn, wisconsin. 

i stepped out on my west facing, second floor deck for a smoke. i immediately noticed a glowing orange oval-ish, upside-down tear drop shaped object. it looked like fire contained in a some sort of membrane. 

it seemed to be slowly free floating from north to south at a downward angle and losing altitude. as i watched the shape seemed to change to a more circular, orb shape and gradually started to appear smaller. the glowing color started to appear more light orange to yellow around the outside edges while staying brighter, darker shade of glowing orange at the center.

at this point it had drifted to a part of the sky where my view was obstructed by bare, leafless tree branches in my backyard. i had to keep shifting my position to keep an eye on it. it seemed to be either stopped, hovering and fading out, or had changed direction to straight west and faded out because it was traveling away from me at a high rate of speed. it faded to a pin prick of orange-yellow light until my eyes could no longer perceive it.

the sky was heavily overcast with thick, dark cloud cover and very slightly sprinkling rain. i'm sure this object had to be below the cloud cover.

i'm interested to know if anyone else in the area saw this.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Amorphous orange orb-oval

content.detailedDescription: Leaving a restaurant in the parking lot, i pointed out venus to my daughter. she said "look, a shooting star!"  i saw the object moving west above us. it was moving too fast to be a satellite but too slow for a meteor or shooting star. after a few seconds, it banked left for about 2 seconds. then it banked right, picked up speed and shot off to the north at a great speed. the whole sighting lasted 10-15 seconds. no blinking lights, just a bright light.  have no point of reference for size, altitude or distance. i watch the skies all the time and have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Light moving west changed direction twice. moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
A somewhat large, white glowing object, almost too white to be a meteor like i have seen in the past, but may have been one, and probably was.  i did want to report it however, and this is my first report.  thank you all for your efforts, and putting together this "very slick" web site.  i have heard this site mentioned on the coast to coast am radio show. :)

the object came down from the sky like a projectile almost vertically, and was so large it immediately caught my eye, in the night sky.  i was very surprised, and i was just a moment earlier speaking of the viral article on rt.Com regarding china's 3rd test flight of their hypersonic attack vehicle that resembles the "falcon" that the usa has. what a coincidence, and was part of the reason i am filing the report.  if a human actually reads this, please send me an email each time.  i will be more inclined to file another report, if i see such things.  i spend a lot of time outside, both at night and day, and sometimes have video recorders on. :)
content.summary: A somewhat large, white glowing object, almost too white to be a meteor

content.detailedDescription: My house has been very active for 2 months now. i see movement every day and night, and it would seem like someone has offloaded their entire zoo onto the earth. the first photo i got was of something with glowing eyes and no body. then i started getting pics of gray shafts of...Smoke(?), which, once i started getting better pics of them, turned out to be tubes that end on a dime, distinctly, as if they have gone into a wall that i am unable to see. also, every single pic i take outside has a big blue beam going right down the center. last week i took a close-up pic of the screen on my porch, where one of the "eyes" always appears, and in the pic you can see a tiny orange dot, and a wire going in and out, so i know this is at least part fraud, but very much not a nickel-and-dime operation. the light and the wire are almost impossibly tiny. there have been military helicopters flying over my house. one night about a month ago i took a night walk in my neighborhood and saw a man, who was about 95% invisible. it was exactly like one you tube video i saw; a us soldier running back into the tank, and he was wearing something that made him almost invisible. i have reached out for help from many many people and organizations and have not gotten a single email back, out of maybe 20. as an expiriment i posted an ad on craigs list, titled project blue beam, and wrote all about it and said email me for pics. zero responses. every time i try to call mufon or other orgs i get a recording, this number is no longer in service etc.... i don't know if i am nasas guinea pig, or if something big is really about to happen. what i read about blue beam is exactly what is happening here; lots and lots of demonic imagery. i am desperate for help. please call me. i know many of my emails are not getting through, and i don't expect this to either, so the phone is the best bet maybe. this is a legitimate sos. everything i've said is absolutely true, and every pic i've taken has not been altered in any way. please please please help me!!!
content.summary: Project blue beam

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home.
a loud booming noise.
lightning but the it started stoping and going and changing direction.
it's mostly a blur i can't remember most of what it looked like all i remember is a loud noise a blurry blob and weird noises.
i was scared at first but then i thought of the possibilities and then i all of a sudden stopped moving and felt an urge to go somewhere i don't know where because i told myself not to because i knew the possibilities.
it flew away quickly and vanished and the sky went back to normal.

i don't know for sure how many people saw.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a fast but stopped everyonce in awhile object in sky that lit up the entire sky
content.locationName: From New Glassgow to Hali, Nova Scotia

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the moon through my 4 inch refracting telescope at a magnification of 70x.  in the dark portion of the moon in the procellarum
region i noted a blue white star like light. intense in the center, fuzzy on the edges. the stellar magnitude was about 5. i thought that it might be a volcanic eruption or out gassing. but, the intensity, shape and appearance did not change at all during the course of the observation. there were no other lights visible.  this was well beyond the terminator and not too far in from the limb in the dark region or unlighted portion of the lunar surface. i was surprised and astounded at the same time. i have been observing the moon for over 30 years and have never seen anything like this. it was not secondary optical reflection. it was there on the surface and remained as described for the full duration of the observation from 07:20-08:10 pm. mst.  i then stopped observing as i was too tired to continue. the blue white light reminded me of the older mercury vapor lights that had annoyed me while observing during earlier years. i feel i am a qualified observer and got the impression it was not a natural event but artificial. 

i was in my backyard at my observatory in dewey. the seeing was excellent and the sky clear and the air steady.
content.summary: Blue white light seen on moon through telescope in dark area of moon surface.

content.detailedDescription: Skywatch started at 8:40 search with north east sweep to south west ovserved single light moving at a higher rate of speed than last than last observation no difinate shape or outline sporadic light pulses during watch till it faded into horizon but rate of speed had changed
content.summary: Light pulseing at a higher rate of speed than last reported
